Reviews.Title: Great compact camera loaded with features
Reviews.Author: ChargerRTDude
Reviews.Content: I just purchaced this camera a few weeks ago when looking for something nice and small. I was surprised by the number of features this little guy has. I have yet to try them all. The screen is large and easy to see. The functions are easy to access and the camera gives you a quick description of when to use them. Excellent quality for the low price. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: sunposephiroth
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera in mid August and have enjoyed it for the most part. I takes pretty decent video, but sometimes picture quality can be pretty inconsistent even within the same settings. Be careful you're loading your camera battery in the right way, it'll click in backwards and make you think it's broken.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera and easy to use!!
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Lingle "Amazon Rules!!!"
Reviews.Content: My mother liked my Fujifilm camera so we went on Amazon and found one in Red. She needed something easy to use and she wanted one that used SD cards and had software to use on her windows computer. When the camera arrived she loved it! We took pictures right away as well as video. All came out perfectly and we even fooled around with some of the features and special effects! This camera is loaded with features and it would take a book to print them all! She is not computer literate "a geek" so to speak, but still was able to transfer the pictures to her computer and then to her digital frame for displaying. Great for day trips. She owns a larger, full size video camera, but liked the fact that this camera took video and she didn't have to lug the big guy around! The software included with the camera was FinePix and it was also easy for her to figure out and use! Hope this helps! For more technical information, I suggest going to reviews online. I can only attest to ease of use and the quality of the pics and video were top notch!

Reviews.Title: Probably too much of a "real" camera for tweens
Reviews.Author: Harry W. Reed
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for a twelfth birthday. It was chosen because of its price, its battery, and its abilities. The price was in a range for a major birthday present. I like that it has a rechargeable "camera-type" battery rather than AA batteries. My FinePix F70 exr has a better zoom, but this one was a fraction of the cost. The only problem we've had with this camera was operator error. Somehow a pin where the cable inserts became bent -- This is why I say that it is too much of a real camera for a tween. I don't know if she put the connector in wrong or if she carried the camera in a pack/purse unprotected, but the damage was done. This damage is not the end of the camera because the pictures can be downloaded by inserting the sd card into the computer and the battery comes out of the camera to charge. Otherwise it is a great inexpensive camera that is getting tons of use.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With Camera!
Reviews.Author: lovetobuy
Reviews.Content: Even in an auditorium it picked up great sound during video recording. I love that it waits till people smile to take the picture. My friends and I love taking this camera with us everywhere. It's so small but takes such clear pictures! A perfect everday take to the family barbeque type of camera!! Pretty color too. A really deep teal green. My previous camera was a Fuji too. I am very happy with Fuji cameras.

Reviews.Title: Tremendous Camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Mancebo "Caramand"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is awesome. The price is incredible and the quality of the images taken is tremendous.  I bought it for my 14 years old daughter and we're pretty satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: Fuji 100 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: ldpeak2
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera.  So light weight and great for traveling.  Takes excellent pictures too.  I bought it to make down loading on my computer easy and it is!!!  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING LITTLE FELLA
Reviews.Author: Monack
Reviews.Content: This very affordable entry level Fujifilm Finepix camera surprises me with very good pictures.  It's AUTO SR (Scene Recognition - although not many) works fine and I particularly like it's Natural Light (N setting), as well as the N (with Flash) setting which takes both a Natural Light and a Flash Photo.  And amazingly, it's HD 720p video doesn't disappoint either, although one cannot compare the result with a video taken by a HD Camcorder.  Overall, I would say this camera is certainly better than those found on a mobile phone and it's small size makes it very easy to carry around as a convenient camera.

Reviews.Title: video has high pitch noise
Reviews.Author: beanrocks "xbean"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera that taking decent pictures in outdoor or well lit area. I like the mode dial feature. Very convenient. It's light weight and compact. Very good for travel. The Li-on battery is sort of small that only last about 200 pictures. The built in flash is so weak that the picture is under-exposed even if the subject is within 5 feet. The 720P video is a nice idea. However, the video recorded has a constant high pitch hiss noise throughout, which is not acceptable. This problem was already mentioned in a early review. I should pay attention to it. I sent email to Fujifilm customer support and asking if they are going to fix the problem with a future firmware update, but got no response. So Fuji has no plan or interest to fix it. I end up return it.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: babydust
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it's great for the price & the picture quality is great compared to my past Sanyo camera's which took odd pictures, the lighting/flash would never do right. Haven't had any problems with this camera yet. Color also looks just like the picture.

Reviews.Title: blurry pictures
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I usually have to take a few pics right in a row and hope to not get a blurry one. This camera is awful and i really regret my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!! Love it!
Reviews.Author: Smg
Reviews.Content: It is a great camera, super easy to use and it takes amazing pictures. (I bought it 4 years ago and still working perfectly!)I totally recommend it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Rugged camera, good clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Courtney Blanchard
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take pictures of the houses I cleaned. I spent a lot of time shoving it in my pocket, it dealt with the cold, got beat up a bit over time. It performed well throughout, and has very good ability to take clear pictures, even when moving. I recommend it. The only drawback it really has is not enough zoom, like for trying to catch your kid in a play if you're not in front row.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Shannon Lacey
Reviews.Content: Got this camera over 2 years ago and have never had one problem with it! Works fantastic and love the color! Would recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Ratings
Reviews.Author: Carlosluis
Reviews.Content: buy this camera for the price and it turns out that when taking pictures do not come out focused, try to take them over and over again but all are blurry and I want to enlarge the photos look pixelated. I do not recommend this camera does not take good photos.

Reviews.Title: Bad camera, bad service
Reviews.Author: ereyzer
Reviews.Content: Worked OK for about half a year, producing pictures expected of this cheaply priced and cheap looking camera.  It was fine with my daughter for whom I purchased it.  Then it just stopped working giving a very blurred pictures.  Sent camera to the vendor, - Fuji claimed that the camera was mishandled and refused to replace it, but kindly suggested to repair it for the cost higher then the camera. Conclusion - 1 star.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful camera to own!!!!
Reviews.Author: nw "lovemy4"
Reviews.Content: I am thirteen and have owned this camera for 8 months now. It's a wonderful camera and very durable. It takes great pictures in the dark. The only cons is that at about 5 months after owning it I noticed that the zoom part began to get a little hard to move, a week later it became almost impossible. Another issue is you can't move when taking a picture or it becomes very blurry and you can't make out the picture. After 2 months of not touching the zoom part it works okay. Overall it's a great camera and I would recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: for my daughter
Reviews.Author: broc
Reviews.Content: this camera takes really great pics. its easy to use. i got this for my 10 yr old daughter who luvs the color. lol i find the finepix download to the computer confusing but thats just me.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm JV100
Reviews.Author: Reviews by Butt Eye "Reviewed By Butt Eye"
Reviews.Content: I have had Fuji Cameras before and have always been Happy but this JV100 does not meet my expectations, and sent camera back to Fuji. Clarity is not there period, will amend this review if Fujifilm fixes it, or is it just the camera, maybe to small of lens, to get what I want for distance.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact, lightweight, and a beautiful color.  It is also so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Doctor of Sciense, PHD
Reviews.Author: XYZ
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm FinePix JV100 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7inch LCD (Blue)Excellent camera, I bought 3 of them for my daughters. They are happy to to have such high quality camera.Thank you to Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Don't like it.
Reviews.Author: J. Ogle
Reviews.Content: I had a JV100 from 2 years ago that got stolen...I was expecting the same camera just updated.  I hate the wheel to change pic format.  It also doesn't come with a memory card, you have to buy that separately.  I should have just spent the extra money on the next model up, b/c I did anyway and I'm not happy with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution for large, photo-quality prints
Capture 720p HD movies with sound
Tracking Auto Focus
Smile and Blink Detection; Face Detection and Automatic Red-eye Removal
Scene Recognition Auto (SR AUTO)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix JV100 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7inch LCD (Blue)
